info.plot: Total VOD: 1173 | Untuk info terkini, sila ke FB Pijanify (https://fb.me/pijanify)

name: Oprah And The Color Purple Journey

info.plot: Di sebalik tabir pembikinan filem The Color Purple Musical serta kesan buku dan filem itu terhadap budaya. Oprah Winfrey akan membawa penonton meneroka kepentingan novel, filem, muzik dan komunikasi budaya.
Seorang gila kerja meminta bantuan jin ajaib dengan harapan untuk mendapatkan kembali keluarganya sebelum Krismas.

name: Please Don'T Destroy: The Treasure Of Foggy Mountain

info.plot: The comedy follows childhood best friends who embark on an adventure in the wilderness to find lost treasure. Their journey proves to be anything but straightforward as they cross paths with hairless bears, nosy park rangers and a cult leader.
Sean Hall bercakap dengan CNN tentang pengambilgunaan budaya dalam industri muzik dan memberikan pandangan terhadap kes Taylor Swift.
“My Animal” mengisahkan tentang Heather Andersonyang jatuh cinta kepada Jonny serta menyimpan rahsia bahawa dia boleh berubah menjadi serigala.
Pada tahun 1956, seorang paderi dibunuh di Perancis, dan kejahatan berleluasa. Rahib wanita Irene berhadapan dengan biarawati syaitan, Valak.
Jaime dianugerahkan dengan perisai yang luar biasa mengubah nasibnya apabila dia menjadi Super Hero Blue Beetle.
Meg 2: The Trench menyelam ke perairan asing bersama Jason Statham dan Wu Jing yang mengetuai pasukan penyelidik meneroka lautan paling dalam.
Kehidupan di Alam Barbie adalah untuk warga yang sempurna belaka. Melainkan anda menghadapi kehidupan krisis. Ataupun anda seorang Ken.
Greta Gerwig menceritakan di sebalik pembikinan Barbie!
Aurora yang berusia 16 tahun mendambakan kehidupan normal – tetapi mesti terlebih dahulu belajar mengawal kuasa psikiknya.
Barry kembali ke masa lalu dan mengubah masa depan tanpa sengaja lalu menyebabkan dia terperangkap dalam realiti dengan Jeneral Zod.
Optimus Prime dan Autobot menghadapi ancaman baru yang mampu memusnahkan dunia dan perlu berganding dengan puak Maximal untuk selamatkan Bumi.
“Shooting Stars” mendedahkan cara LeBron membentuk kerjaya pertamanya sebagai salah seorang pemain bola keranjang terhebat sepanjang zaman.
Filem arahan Tina Satter, Sweeney sebagai Reality Winner, seorang wanita yang disabitkan kesalahan membocorkan laporan sulit mengenai campur tangan pilihan raya Rusia kepada media.
Pembikin filem, Rachel Fleit mengikuti empat wanita muda apabila mereka cuba menyertai salah satu sororiti universiti yang eksklusif dan berpengaruh.
Pemandu trak, Kiran menemui Elena di dalam kontena. Dia merentas negara untuk bantu mencari keluarga gadis itu dan mempelajari perspektif baru.
Pertemuan semula dua beradik perempuan yang renggang dipendekkan oleh syaitan yang merasuki daging menyebabkan mereka terpaksa berjuang untuk terus hidup.
"Praise This" mengikuti perjalanan Sam, seorang penyanyi muda bercita-cita tinggi yang bermimpi untuk menceburi industri muzik.
Pengembaraan Mario dan abangnya yang kurus, Luigi, dalam usaha mereka untuk menyelamatkan Puteri Peach daripada penjahat Bowser.
DUNGEONS & DRAGONS ialah filem pengembaraan epik adaptasi daripada francais permainan popular Hasbro.

Apabila Daughters of Atlas, trio dewa purba yang pendendam tiba di Bumi untuk mencari sihir yang dicuri daripada mereka sejak dahulu lagi, Billy—atau Shazam—dan keluarganya bertempur demi kuasa, nyawa, dan nasib dunia mereka.
Empat mangsa yang terselamat dari Woodsboro berpindah ke New York City, tetapi Ghostface kembali dan masih memburu mereka.

Di dalam waktu yang huru-hara, sebuah perkampungan terpencil diserang oleh puntianak (Phi Phob). Tiada siapa yang berani keluar rumah pada waktu malam. Malah polis juga dalam ketakutan dan enggan membantu. Khun Pan, seorang pegawai polis dan ahli sihir terkenal, dihantar untuk meyiasat kes itu. Perkampungan itu dikatakan telah menjadi sarang bagi dua orang penyamun, Sua Dum dan Sua Mahesuan.

name: The Weeknd: Live At Sofi Stadium

info.plot: Persembahan secara langsung bintang Kanada The Weeknd di Stadium SoFi, Los Angeles.
Di dalam hutan Georgia, seekor pemangsa seberat 500 paun telah mengambil sejumlah banyak kokain dan mengamuk demi lebih banyak dadah serta darah.

name: War Zone: Bear Grylls Meets President Zelenskyy

info.plot: Bear Grylls mengembara ke Ukraine untuk bertemu Volodymyr Zelenskyy, di Kiev, dan orang-orang berani yang tinggal di zon perang.

"Magic" Mike Lane kembali ke pentas selepas sekian lama menyepi lepas perniagaan yang gagal dan menyebabkan dia muflis seta menjadi pelayan bar di Florida. Mike ke London bersama seorang sosialit yang menawarkan sesuatu yang mustahil ditolak…

Dua beradik menjalankan hospital burung untuk menyelamatkan burung hitam yang cedera. Di salah satu bandar paling padat di dunia, "saudara burung" menjaga beribu-ribu makhluk memukau yang jatuh dari langit New Delhi yang dipenuhi asap.
American Pain ialah kisah skim haram dadah terhebat yang melanda Florida sejak koboi kokain pada 1980-an.
Empat kawan baik memulakan perjalanan liar ke Super Bowl LI 2017 untuk menyaksikan wira mereka Tom Brady bermain.
Sebuah keluarga yang bercuti di sebuah kabin telah ditahan oleh empat orang bersenjata dan perlu membuat keputusan bagi menghindari malapetaka.
Kehidupan seorang vlogger dan pempengaruh yang tersusun kini berubah setelah beliau menjadi seorang ibu.

name: When You Finish Saving The World

info.plot: Evelyn telah mengabdikan dirinya untuk membantu orang, tapi dia bergelut dengan anaknya Ziggy, seorang bintang internet yang bercita-cita tinggi.

Pengembaraan menyeronokkan tiga mumia Mesir yang tinggal di bandar rahsia bawah tanah di Mesir purba. Selepas beberapa peristiwa malang, mumia itu berakhir di London masa kini dan memulakan perjalanan yang aneh dan kelakar.

Apabila sepasang pembersih rumah yang bernasib Malang mendapati mereka ditugaskan untuk membersihkan rumah agam Lebron James semasa dia berada di luar negara, mereka memutuskan untuk membuat keputusan yang akan mengubah hidup mereka dengan mengadakan parti besar-besaran supaya mereka diingati dan mendapat wang. Apabila parti menjadi tak terkawal dan salah satu cincin kejuaraan Lebron hilang, mereka berdepan dengan satu malam liar yang takkan mereka lupakan.
Dengan harapan dapat berbaik semula dengan ayahnya yang ortodoks, anak kepada pengarah pengebumian Chasidic pulang ke rumah bersama isterinya yang sedang mengandung.

name: The Ringleader: The Case Of The Bling Ring

info.plot: Sebuah dokumentari tentang Rachel Lee, ketua pencuri Hollywood 2009 yang dikenali sebagai Bling Ring.

Bintang Filem Senyap, Bintang Muda, Eksekutif Penerbitan dan Pemuzik Sensasi perlu mengekalkan kerelevenan mereka pada zaman 1920-an di Hollywood semasa industri sedang melonjak ke hala tuju yang lebih baik.
Selepas mendapat hak penjagaan anak ke atas anak buahnya, Gemma meminta bantuan prototaip M3GAN.
Sudah tiba masanya untuk berparti dengan bintang besar Lizzo di Kia Forum, LA dengan penuh kepositifan, ketawa dan kasih sayang - mengingatkan kita semua tentang makna menjadi "100% wanita itu."
Carole McKay langsung tidak menyukai Krismas. Tapi pada hari sebelum Krismas, masa lampau, kini dan masa depan Carole akan bertembung satu sama lain.

name: Puss In Boots: The Last Wish

info.plot: Kucing mahir pedang kegemaran semua telah kembali untuk pengembaraan baru di dalam dunia Shrek, apabila Puss in Boots membuat pencarian untuk mendapatkan Bintang Permintaan.
Seorang pengarah filem Krismas mendapati dirinya hidup dalam satu cerita dalam filem komedi romantik ini.
Sekumpulan askar upahan telah mengambil beberapa tebusan pada hari sebelum Krismas tanpa menyedari bahawa ancaman terbesar mereka ialah Santa Claus.
Dolly mengimbau masa lampaunya melalui kemunculan Tiga Lelaki Wajar sepanjang adegan nyanyian dan latihan filem ini.
Sudan tiba masanya untuk menyambut perayaan dengan Tom dan Jerry! Dengan sihir, Jerry dan anak saudaranya, Tuffy, membuat tikus salji yang hidup secara ajaib!
Seorang bintang yang berjaya dengan menjadi dirinya sendiri. Dokumentari itu berkongsi kisah di sebalik permulaannya yang sederhana dan kepayahannya hingga kegemilangannya.
Impian seorang artis berbakat terbantut seketika apabila vannya rosak di sebuah bandar kecil sebelum Krismas.
Sekumpulan kanak-kanak yang berani berusaha untuk menyelesaikan kes harta karun Krismas yang dicuri di sebuah bandar dalam filem ini.
Sebuah drama autobiografi oleh pengarah legenda Steven Spielberg berdasarkan zaman kanak-kanaknya sendiri.
Bandar kecil Brightridge mendapat kejutan apabila seekor rusa kutub dan seorang gadis muda berganding bahu bagi menyelamatkan kedai datuknya.

name: The Travelog: Hyoyeon & Sunny In Qatar

info.plot: Sertai Hyoyeon dan Sunny daripada kumpulan gadis K-pop terkemuka Korea, Girl's Generation, sambil mereka menikmati keindahan Timur Tengah.
Pada Pesta Tuai, ketibaan seorang budak lelaki secara tiba-tiba mengubah keluarga Walton dengan cara yang mereka tidak pernah bayangkan.
Dua wartawan membongkar skandal Hollywood dan menggalakkan wanita untuk bersuara, menghancurkan sistem rasuah berdasarkan siasatan New York Times.
Susulan daripada filem “A Christmas Story," Ralphie sudah menjadi dewasa dan perlu menghadapi Krismas sebagai seorang ayah.
Dokumentari ini menceritakan tentang New England Santa Society serta percubaan mereka bagi membawa kepelbagaian kepada Santa.

Fletch adalah suspek utama dalam kes pembunuhan semasa mencari koleksi seni yang dicuri. Dia mengalihkan tumpuannya kepada pelakon watak aneh untuk menentukan siapa pembunuhnya dan membersihkan namanya.
Frylock, Master Shake, Meatwad dan Carl berganding semula untuk melawan syarikat Amazin yang diketuai oleh  Neil serta teman sampingan, Elmer.
Filem ini mencartakan kerjaya Willie Mays dari zaman kecilnya di Alabama dan ketika beliau bersama dengan Birmingham Black Baron di Negro League.

name: 2022 Rock & Roll Hall Of Fame Induction Ceremony

info.plot: Penerima anugerah 2022—Pat Benatar dan Neil Giraldo, Duran Duran, Eminem, Eurythmics, Dolly Parton, Lionel Richie dan Carly Simon—diberikan penghormatan.

name: Tad, The Lost Explorer And The Emerald Tablet

info.plot: Impian arkeologi Tad musnah sewaktu dia memecahkan sumpahan sarkofagus tanpa sengaja. Dia dan Sara berusaha untuk menamatkan sumpahan Tablet Emerald.

Dalam misi tempur terakhirnya merentasi pergunungan berceranggah di Afghanistan, jet juruterbang Tentera Udara Diraja Lt. Kate Sinclair (Charlotte Kirk) ditembak jatuh di atas salah satu kubu pemberontak paling berbahaya. Apabila pemberontak mengejarnya di lokasi nahas, dia mencari perlindungan di kubu bawah tanah yang telah lama ditinggalkan.
Kisah dewasa peribadi tentang kekuatan keluarga dan mengejar Impian Amerika.
TÁR mengisahkan perubahan kuasa dalam dunia moden, mengenai Lydia Tár, komposer dan ketua pemimpin wanita pertama orkestra terkenal Jerman.
Seorang lelaki berkulit putih membunuh 11 orang di pusat keagamaan Yahudi di Pittsburgh membuka isu krisis kebencian yang mengancam keselamatan kolektif kita.
George Clooney dan Julia Roberts bekerjasama sebagai bekas kekasih untuk menghalang anak perempuan mereka yang dilamun cinta daripada mengulangi kesilapan mereka.
Pertemuan semula keluarga di rumah agam terpencil menjadi maut kerana terperangkap dalam permainan ikhtiar hidup dan hanya seorang yang akan hidup.

name: Batman And Superman: Battle Of The Super Sons

info.plot: Jonathan Kent yang mengetahui dirinya mempunyai kuasa besar bergabung dengan Boy Wonder, Damian Wayne untuk menyelamatkan ayah-ayah mereka (Superman dan Batman) dalam dunia yang diserang oleh makhluk asing, Starro.
Halloween tiba dan musuh ingin membalas dendam terhadap Mystery, Inc.

Geram dengan percutian perayaan seasama ahli Batwheels, Batwing putuskan untuk pergi sendirian untuk menghalang rancangan jahat Mr. Freeze. Bagaimanapun, Batwing dan Batwheels saling bertelagah , meninggalkan Batwing sendirian apabila penjahat sejuk beku membekukan Bam, Buff, Bibi dan Redbird. Mampukah Batwing menghalang matlamat Mr. Freeze untuk membekukan seluruh Gotham dan hancurkan Krismas tanpa bantuan Batwheels?

Pengakhiran epik francais Halloween telah sampai kemuncaknya, setelah Laurie Strode (Jamie Lee Curts) bertembung dengan berdepan dengan Michael Myers buat  kali terakhir. Hanya salah satu daripada mereka yang akan terselamat.

Lin, kelulusan Harvard tanpa draf, mengejutkan teman pasukan dan para peminat serta memberi harapan kepada warga Asia di seluruh dunia setelah dia mendapat 38 mata di Madison Square Garden menentang Los Angeles Lakers. Ia lantas meneruskan kebangkitannya dan populariti “Linsanity.”
Kano yang ganas dan gila kuasa berazam untuk mengambil alih Earthrealm. Dibantu oleh trio askar upahan yang kejam, Black Dragon, dia memulakan serangan kejam dari bandar ke bandar.

Dr. Rose Cotter (Sosie Bacon) mendapat bayangan yang menakutkan selepas menyaksikan satu insiden pesakit yang mengerikan, dan mesti berdepan dengan masa lalunya untuk melarikan diri dari realitinya yang baru.
The Good House mengisahkan tentang perubahan hidup Hildy Good, seorang ejen hartanah New England dan keturunan ahli sihir Salem.

name: Bring It On: Cheer Or Die

info.plot: Sepasukan penyorak melatih rutin mereka secara rahsia di sekolah terbiar tanpa menyedari mereka dikurung oleh pembunuh yang tak dikenali.
Kisah yang meremang dan lucu ini menceritakan tentang puntianak, Lily jatuh cinta pandang pertama terhadap makhluk hijau Bernama Herman.

Sebuah cerita seram psikologi yang penuh dengan liku, Don’t Worry Darling, arahan pengarah Olivia Wilde yang mencungkil bakat Florence Pugh dan Harry Styles, juga dikelilingi dengan watak-watak yang menarik.
Bruce Cogburn, seorang pengarang mula menerima surat daripada peminat yang taksub. Dia menjumpai teka-teki yang bahaya ketika mencari orang yang menghantar mesej rahsia itu.
Bri, seorang penyanyi rap yang berbakat usia 16 tahun, cuba untuk memenangi pertandingan rap demi keluarga serta legasi ayahnya.

Apabila penguat kuasa rusuhan terkemuka Miami mendapati wanita bosnya telah menceburkan diri ke dalam pemerdagangan seksual siber, dia memutuskan untuk mengorbankan segala-galanya untuk menyelamatkan seorang remaja muda yang melarikan diri.

Sebuah komedi menarik dibintangi oleh Jon Hamm sebagai Fletch yang menawan, yang menjadi suspek utama dalam kes pembunuhan semasa mencari koleksi seni yang dicuri. Dia meneliti ramai orang untuk mencari dalangnya untuk membersihkan namanya.
MOONAGE DAYDREAM merangkumi kisah hidup dan kebijaksanaan David Bowie, salah satu artis yang terkenal dan berpengaruh yang pernah wujud.
Sekumpulan rakan kolej menyewa rumah pintar untuk berpesta hujung minggu. Tapi, mereka mula menyedari bahawa Margaux, sistem AI termaju rumah itu, mempunyai reka bentuk jahat untuk mereka.
Emma tinggal bersama mak ciknya selepas kematian bapanya. Suaminya mengesyaki Emma dan seorang gadis sekolah baru mengetahui rahsianya.

Seorang penjenayah kecil sedang melarikan diri dengan beg yang penuh dengan wang tunai dan kokain. Dia sangat keliru dan cedera parah. Dengan peluru di dalam perutnya dia kesuntukan masa. CEPAT. Jika dia tidak mendapat pemindahan darah dalam beberapa jam akan datang, dia akan mati. Dia akan mati lebih cepat jika VIC , baron dadah wanita Mexico yang menjadi manga curinya menangkapnya terlebih dulu. Dia menaiki bas sehala ke luar bandar. Rakan-rakannya, Mac dan JJ tak begitu bernasib baik. Freddy mencuba setiap helah dan setiap hubungan yang dia ada untuk membawanya keluar daripada situasi ini. Bas menjadi tempt penyeksaannya. Di dalam bas, salah seorang penumpang kelihatan tak macam yang mereka nampak manakala seorang lagi, seorang gadis remaja, berjalan sendiri ke sudut berbahaya dan gelap. Apabila masa Freddy habis, dia telah menghadapi syaitannya.

Memecut di padang pasir Maghribi untuk menghadiri pesta hujung minggu rakan lama, orang kaya London David dan Jo Henninger (Ralph Fiennes dan Jessica Chastain) mengalami kemalangan tragis dengan seorang remaja lelaki tempatan.

name: Honk For Jesus, Save Your Soul

info.plot: Selepas kejadian skandal yang besar, wanita pertama Gereja Baptist Selatan dan suaminya, seorang pastor, cuba untuk membina semula jemaah mereka yang hampir pupus. Ia merupakan kemunculan semula yang terbesar di dalam komoditi keagamaan.
John McEnroe, seorang pemain tenis yang berjaya mengubah sukan ini tapi terkenal dengan sifatnya yang panas baran, berang dan kata-katanya.
Sebuah filem seram baru yang mendebarkan tentang seorang ayah dan dua anak perempuannya yang diburu oleh singa buas di Afrika Selatan.
Seorang anak muda menemukan markas rahasia dari superhero terkuat di dunia di bawah rumahnya dan ia harus mempertahankannya dengan teman-temannya terhadap serangan lawan.

Bagi kawan baik Becky dan Hunter, hidup adalah tentang menakluki ketakutan dan melangkaui had. Selepas mereka mendaki 2,000 kaki ke puncak menara radio yang terpencil, mereka terkandas tanpa jalan ke bawah.
Manusia tiruan mempersoalkan realiti apabila kenangan kehidupan lampau muncul semula.

Bintang komedi berdiri Jo Koy (Jo Koy: In His Elements, Jo Koy: Comin' in Hot) berlakon sebagai seorang lelaki yang pulang sempena perayaan Easter dengan keluarganya yang kecoh dalam filem untuk masyarakat Filipina-Amerika.

Dalam DC League of Super-Pets, Krypto Si Anjing Super dan Superman adalah kawan baik, berkongsi kuasa besar yang sama dan membanteras jenayah di Metropolis bersama-sama. Apabila Superman dan semua ahli Justice League diculik, Krypto perlu yakinkan kumpulan perlindungan jalanan. Ace Si Anjing, PB Si Khinzir, Merton Si Penyu dan Chip Si Tupai untuk menguasai kuasa baru mereka dan membantunya menyelamatkan semua adiwira.
Seorang adi wira kembali ke dunia untuk menebus dirinya.

Dalam Filem DC Universe yang mendebarkan ini, Green Lantern terbaru di bumi akan muncul! Apabila Cincin Kuasa dianugerahkan kepada bekas Marin John Stewart, dia berhadapan dengan misi yang mengubah hidupnya.
The Looney Builders prepare to host a big holiday lights festival in Looneyburg Park when an unexpected snowstorm prevents Looneyburgers from attending.
Filem ganas baru karya pemenang Academy Award® Jordan Peele ("Get Out," "Us"), dibintangi oleh Daniel Kaluuya, Keke Palmer dan Steven Yeun.

Selepas bekerja, kelaparan dan berjudi untuk mengumpul dana untuk mengejar impiannya, Pn. Harris memulakan pengembaraan ke Paris yang bukan sahaja mengubah pandangannya sendiri, tetapi juga masa depan House of Dior.
Filem ini mempersembahkan potret Sir Ranulph Fiennes yang menarik, menggabungkan masa lalu dan masa kini melalui arkib dan dokumentari.
Empat wartawan di negara demokrasi berdepan dengan bahaya ketika cuba membongkar mereka yang berkuasa, menunjukkan kepentingan kebebasan akhbar.
Pada 1970-an, Gru membesar di pinggir bandar. Seorang peminat kumpulan super penjahat yang dikenali sebagai Vicious 6, Gru merancang untuk menjadi cukup jahat untuk menyertai mereka.
BJ Novak dan Blumhouse Productions bekerjasama dalam filem arahan pertama Novak, audio siar-wartawan yang menyiasat kematian bekas kekasihnya.
“Elvis” mengisahkan kehidupan dan muzik Elvis Presley, yang dilihat melalui hubungan rumitnya dengan pengurus, Kolonel Tom Parker selama 20 tahun.

Finney, budak lelaki berusia 13 tahun yang pemalu tetapi pandai, diculik oleh pembunuh sadis dan terperangkap di ruang bawah tanah kalis bunyi. Apabila telefon yang terputus di dinding mula berdering, Finney mendapati dia dapat mendengar suara mangsa pembunuh sebelum ini.
Selepas kematian mengejut bidan mereka, sepasang suami isteri L.A. mengupah anaknya untuk menjadi pembantu bidan yang tinggal bersama mereka.
Brian, seorang pencipta yang keseorangan membina robot untuk syarikat, tetapi dia terpaksa berdepan dengan lebih banyak daripada yang dia sangka dalam komedi yang menawan ini.

A romantic comedy-drama in which an uptight father (Andy Garcia) tries to come to grips with his daughter's upcoming wedding, framed through the prism of multiple relationships within a big, sprawling Cuban-American Latino clan. Remake of the 1950 film of the same name, which had another hit version in 1991 starring Steve Martin.

Kisah benar yang menakjubkan tentang bagaimana pesara Jerry Selbee menemui kelemahan matematik dalam loteri Massachusetts dan, dengan bantuan isterinya, Marge, memenangi 27 juta dolar dan menggunakan wang itu untuk memulihkan bandar kecil mereka di Michigan.

Tweety berkuasa dan bertanggungjawab selepas mengambil takhta dalam filem baru ini. Apabila ratu pulau hilang, Tweety tiba-tiba menjadi yang seterusnya untuk mengambil takhta. Kawan-kawan Tweety termasuk Nenek bermotosikal dan Sylvester yang licik, yang kesetiaannya diuji apabila dia menemui rancangan jahat untuk menghapuskan Tweety buat selamanya! Bulu-bulu akan berterbangan dalam kisah lucu ini yang menunjukkan kerabat diraja dan kesetiaan boleh datang dalam pelbagai bentuk dan saiz.
Edward Buckles, Jr. mendokumentasikan kisah rakan sebayanya yang terselamat daripada ribut Katrina semasa dia berumur 12 tahun di New Orleans.
Empat tahun selepas kemusnahan Isla Nublar, dinosaur kini hidup bersama manusia di seluruh dunia dan mengancam untuk mengatasi manusia sebagai pemangsa puncak planet ini.
Pada tahun 1972, polis Chicago menahan tujuh wanita yang membentuk rangkaian rahsia bernama Jane, yang menyediakan tempat pengguguran haram.

Seorang Marsyal AS melindungi saksi – isteri kepada bos sindiket jenayah – di Afrika Selatan. Mereka perlu bekerjasama dan yakin antara satu sama lain untuk menyelamatkan diri dan menghentikan jenayah.
Emma dan Scarlett, dua pontianak nakal bergabung tenaga untuk menyelamatkan adik mereka apabila dia melarikan diri daripada cubaan penculikan yang mengorbankan ibu bapa mereka sebelum ini.

Selepas 30 tahun, Maverick (Tom Cruise) masih bergiat aktif sebagai juruterbang tentera laut atasan, tetapi dia harus mendepani sejarah ngerinya apabila dia mengetuai anggota elit baru TOP GUN dalam misi yang memerlukan pengorbanan daripada para juruterbang yang terlibat.
This documentary film follows Russian opposition leader, Alexey Navalny, through his political rise, attempted assassination and search to uncover the truth.

name: Teen Titans Go! & Dc Super Hero Girls: Mayhem In The Multiverse

info.plot: Apa yang anda dapat jika gabungkan DC Super Hero Girls, Legion Doom dan Teen Titans Go! dengan ratu Kriptoni? Akan berlakulah huru-hara! Dengan pertolongan azimat dari Kripton, Lex Luthor menyatukan pasukan adiwira untuk menangkap semua adi wira bumi dan meninggalkan hanya DC Super Hero Girls untuk hentikan Legion Doom. Gadis itu perlu menyeberang dimensi untuk menyelamatkan adi wira lain daripada Zon Hantu, tapi mereka tiba di alam semesta lain. Saksikan perlawanan alam semesta DC untuk menyelamatkan dunia dengan peristiwa epik!
Fenomena di seluruh dunia bersambung dalam "Downton Abbey 2", susulan kepada sambungan filem cereka popular 2019 daripada siri televisyen popular di seluruh dunia.
“Firestarter" mengisahkan seorang gadis muda (Ryan Kiera Armstrong) yang mempunyai pyrokinesis, menarik perhatian agensi rahsia kerajaan yang ingin mengeksploitasi kuasanya sebagai senjata.

name: Dc Showcase: Constantine - The House Of Mystery

info.plot: Selepas menghalang Perang Apokalips, John Constantine, yang terperangkap dalam Rumah Misteri, melalui kitaran tanpa henti yang sentiasa berakhir dengan kematiannya. Bolehkah dia melarikan diri dari neraka ini?
Alex Lewis ialah seorang pembunuh upahan pakar. Apabila Alex enggan menyelesaikan tugas untuk organisasi jenayah berbahaya, dia menjadi sasaran dan perlu memburu mereka yang nak dia mati.
Daripada pengarah Robert Eggers, muncullah The Northman, sebuah filem aksi tentang putera Viking muda membalas dendam untuk pembunuhan ayahnya.
Kru penjenayah haiwan yang hebat akan cuba menjayakan penipuan mereka yang paling mencabar iaitu menjadi model rakyat.

name: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets Of Dumbledore

info.plot: Profesor Albus Dumbledore tahu ahli sihir Jahat yang berkuasa Gellert Grindelwald sedang bertindak untuk menguasai dunia ahli sihir.

name: Tony Hawk: Until The Wheels Fall Off

info.plot: Filem ini adalah tentang kehidupan dan kerjaya ikonik Hawk, dan hubungannya dengan sukan yang sudah sebati dengannya selama beberapa dekad.
Dalam filem aksi yang diarahkan oleh Michael Bay ini, adik-beradik terdesak merampas ambulans selepas rompakan mereka tak berjaya, dan menjadi pelarian paling luar biasa yang pernah dilihat di LA.

Landak biru kegemaran orang ramai kembali lagi! Dr. Robotnik kembali kali ini bersama teman baharu, Knuckles, mencari zamrud yang berkuasa. Sonic dan kawannya, Tails menghentikan rancangan Dr. Robotnik sebelum terlambat.

Stephen Fry embarks on an incredible journey to discover the stories behind some of the world's most fantastic beasts. Whether digging for dragons, or meeting distant relatives of the unicorn, Stephen reveals the real-life beasts that have inspired some of the greatest myths and legends in history, story-telling and film.

Apabila tugasan pertamanya tidak berjaya, seorang bekas tentera elit diburu, terperangkap dalam konspirasi dan berjuang untuk terus hidup untuk pulang ke rumah dan mendedahkan motif sebenar orang yang mengkhianatinya.
Filem aksi cereka sains yang lucu tentang wanita Cina Amerika yang tak mampu membayar cukai dan mendapat tahu dia mampu menyelamatkan seluruh dunia pelbagai.

Selepas diculik oleh pemburu harta karun yang jahat, seorang novelis romantik yang berjaya dipaksa bergabung dengan model muka hadapannya kerana mereka terperangkap di dalam hutan yang penuh pengembaraan.

name: Super Greed: The Fight For Football

info.plot: Super Greed: The Fight for Football menceritakan kisah dalaman yang dramatik tentang liga yang telah ditakdirkan musnah melalui mata mereka yang membantu menjatuhkannya.

Selepas kerjaya sedekad yang penuh dengan kecederaan dan peluang yang terlepas, Michael Bisping, ahli middleweight UFC yang berusia 38 tahun akhirnya mendapat haknya, dan dia bercadang untuk keluar menjadi lebih baik.

"The Outfit" mengikuti kehidupan seorang tukang jahit Inggeris yang pernah menghasilkan sut di Savile Row di London yang terkenal di dunia. Selepas berlaku tragedi yang agak peribadi, dia berpindah ke Chicago, mengendalikan kedai tukang jahit kecil di bahagian pinggir bandar. Dia membuat pakaian cantik untuk satu-satunya orang di kawasan itu yang mampu membelinya. Keluarga samseng ganas.

name: Making Of The Last Of Us

info.plot: Dokumentari penuh yang memaparkan usaha di sebalik tabir yang gerun dalam pembikinan siri popular The Last Of Us.
Apabila pembunuh bersiri sadis mula membunuh ahli politik utama di Gotham, Batman menyiasat rasuah tersembunyi di bandar itu dan mencari pelakunya.

Matsuri Takabayashi yang berusia 20 tahun mengetahui bahawa dia hanya ada sepuluh tahun untuk hidup akibat penyakit yang tidak dapat diubati. Dia memutuskan untuk tidak memikirkan hidupnya dan tidak jatuh cinta, tetapi dia bertemu Kazuto Manabe di perjumpaan sekolah.

Selepas melarikan diri dari perhambaan pada usia 20 tahun, Frederick Douglass menjadi lelaki kulit hitam yang paling terkenal pada abad ke-19 kerana kata-katanya. Dokumentari HBO ini mengenai kebangkitan beliau daripada seorang pejuang yang bersemangat kepada negarawan yang tenang.

Mengumpul hampir 20 bilion dolar sepanjang separuh abad yang lalu dan mengungguli beberapa tawaran perniagaan paling hebat pada zaman kita, Carl Icahn ialah seorang perunding dan pakar strategi yang digeruni dalam seni pengambilalihan dan pelaburan korporat.

Penuh dengan lagu asli oleh Jennifer Lopez dan bintang muzik Latin global Maluma, "Marry Me" menampilkan Lopez sebagai bintang muzikal Kat Valdez dan Owen Wilson sebagai Charlie Gilbert, seorang guru matematik—orang yang tidak dikenali yang bersetuju untuk berkahwin dan kemudian mengenali satu sama lain . Percintaan yang agak mustahil tentang dua orang berbeza yang mencari sesuatu yang nyata dalam dunia yang nilainya berdasarkan suka dan pengikut, "Marry Me" ialah kisah cinta moden tentang selebriti, perkahwinan dan media sosial.

After an agoraphobic Seattle tech worker (Kravitz) discovers recorded evidence of a violent crime during an ordinary data stream review, she tries reporting it up the chain of command at her company. Met with resistance and bureaucracy, she realises that in order to get involved she will have to do the thing she fears the most — leave the safety of her apartment and step out into the open onto the streets that absolutely terrify her.Directed by Steven Soderbergh (Erin Brockovich, Ocean’s Elevan, Contagion). Written by David Koepp (Jurassic Park, Panic Room, Spider-Man).
Bulan sedang menuju ke bumi dengan pelanggaran. Tiga orang adi wira meneruskan misi ke angkasa lepas untuk menghentikan malapetaka, tapi mereka dapat tahu yang bulan bukan seperti yang kita fikir.

name: And Just Like That... The Documentary

info.plot: A one-off documentary, chronicling how the new chapter of the beloved hit series "Sex And The City", came to be.
High schooler Vada navigates the emotional fallout she experiences in the wake of a school tragedy. Relationships with her family and friends, as well as her view of the world, are forever altered.

Difilem secara keseluruhannya melalui dunia reality maya, dokumentari ini memaparkan keterujaan dan hubungan rapat gerakan budaya yang semakin berkembang. Ia menunjukkan hubungan dalam talian yang kuat di dalam dunia yang penuh denganpengasingan.

Claire, wanita muda bercita-cita tinggi mempunyai segala-galanya - jawatan baru di agensi hartanah terkemuka dan cinta baru. Tetapi hidupnya berubah apabila dia telah jatuh cinta dengan isteri bosnya, terperangkap dalam jaringan niat jahat.

name: Harry Potter 20Th Anniversary: Return To Hogwarts

info.plot: Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint and Emma Watson join filmmaker Chris Columbus and other esteemed cast members across all eight Harry Potter films as they travel back to Hogwarts for the first time to celebrate the anniversary of the franchise's first film, Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone, which premiered 20 years ago. The retrospective special  will tell an enchanting making-of story through all-new in-depth Harry Potter 20th Anniversary: Return to Hogwartsinterviews and cast conversations, inviting fans on a magical first person journey through one of the most beloved film franchises of all time.
Sebuah dokumentari lucu dan intim yang meraikan kehidupan dan warisan mendiang pelakon, penulis, dan penerbit Bob Einstein.

Filem keempat yang telah lama ditunggu-tunggu dalam francais aksi, yang menyatukan semula Keanu Reeves dan Carrie-Anne Moss, kembali ke dunia dua realiti - satu, kehidupan seharian; lagi satu, apa yang ada di sebaliknya.
Siaran di sebalik tabir kemunculan semula Teater Awam "Shakespeare in the Park" selepas penutupannya akibat pandemik global.

Matt, seorang CEO yang bijak dalam kewangan, membeli syarikat penerbangan serantau milik keluarga Jenny. Inisiatif penjimatan kos Matt mengancam Krismas apabila dia membatalkan faedah amal percutian tahunan syarikat penerbangan itu untuk kanak-kanak yang kurang bernasib baik.

Kisah luar biasa Nadia Nadim, bekas pelarian Afghanistan yang menjadi pemain bintang untuk Saint-Germain Paris, dan inspirasi kepada pelarian di seluruh dunia yang terpaksa meninggalkan tanah air mereka.
Pembongkaran budaya rasuah antara anggota polis Baltimore selepas kes kematian detektif Sean Suiter yang ditembak pada tahun 2017 yang masih belum selesai.

The Forever Prisoner mengisahkan tentang Abu Zubaydah, tahanan bernilai tinggi bagi program Teknik Soal Siasat yang Dipertingkatkan CIA (EIT) – juga dikenal pasti sebagai seksaan oleh orang luar agensi.
Penghormatan yang penuh inspirasi untuk pelakon dan pembuat filem Adrienne Shelly, meraikan kehidupan dan kerjanya sambil mengupas tragedi kematiannya.
Apabila Sprinkles beranggapan yang Krismas tidak memerlukan Santa Claus, Beebo dan rakan pergi ke North Pole untuk mengetahui erti sebenar Krismas.
Perjalanan 36 tahun ke dalam hidup tiga kawan yang terlibat dengan penagihan dadah dan jenayah di Newark, New Jersey.
“The Walton’s Homecoming” bermula pada Zaman Meleset pada tahun 1933 melalui pandangan John Boy yang ingin menjadi seorang penulis.

Percutian ini, Liddles gembira kerana pelbagai perkara! Jacquie Liddle (Kelly Rowland) dan suaminya Tyler (Thomas Cadrot) sedang bersiap sedia untuk kelahiran bayi pertama mereka. Sementara itu, kakak Jacquie, Treena (Latonya Williams) dan suaminya Julian (Jaime M. Callica) sedang memikirkan untuk mengambil bayi angkat, dan hubungan Kiera (Bresha Webb), kakak yang bersemangat dan bergaya, dengan Chris (Nathan Witte) semakin hangat. Dengan keluarga mereka berkembang dengan cara yang tidak pernah mereka jangkakan, Liddles menuju ke Krismas gila yang penuh dengan kekecohan yang meriah dan Penh dental kasha sayang dan ketawa.

name: Time For Them To Come Home For Christmas

info.plot: Seorang wanita yang mengalami amnesia menaiki kereta dengan jururawatnya yang kacak untuk menyiasat satu-satunya petunjuk identitinya: keratan akhbar mengenai perayaan Krismas dengan jemputan misteri.
Merasa seperti hidupnya telah merosot, seorang wanita muda menghabiskan percutian bersama bekas teman lelakinya dan keluarganya yang aneh.

Set in suburban Chicago in the 1980s, a 10-year old boy named Jake Doyle sets out on an epic quest to get the Christmas gift of his generation - the latest and greatest video game system. Adapts the debut novel by Kevin Jakubowski which is a heartfelt and humorous look at childhood misadventures. Jakubowski also wrote the screenplay of this family comedy.
Richard Williams adalah seorang ayah yang tidak berputus asa dalam membesarkan dua atlet berbakat yang akan mengubah sukan tenis selama-lamanya.

Jessica dan John Chambers (Angela Sarafyan, Paul Schneider) bercuti di luar bandar Louisiana dengan anak perempuan mereka Anna (Lia McHugh). Apabila jiran tiba tanpa diundang, percutian ini menguji ikatan kekeluargaan mereka.
Penceritaan yang berlatarkan peperangan, perpisahan dan penempatan pelarian keluarga Syria dari lima buah negara yang ingin membina hidup baharu.

Filmed over five years in Kansas City, Transhood chronicles the lives of four young people (aged 4, 7, 12, and 15 at the start of filming) and their families as they navigate growing up transgender in America’s heartland. By sharing personal realities of how gender expression is reshaping their lives, the film explores how these families struggle and stumble through parenting, and how the kids are challenged and transformed as they experience the complexity of their identities.Directed by Sharon Liese (creator of High School Confidential), produced by Sasha Alpert (Autism: The Musical), and executive-produced by Kimberly Reed, Transhood offers a long-range understanding of transgender youth through the nuanced and authentic stories of Jay, Avery, Leena, and Phoenix.While every journey is different, these families share their honest and varied experiences as the young people display incredible resilience, facing rejection from their peers and escalating political rhetoric that strives to invalidate LGBTQ+ lives. All the while, the older kids navigate the minefield of adolescence. Sharing their most vulnerable moments, the parents reveal their ambivalence, doubts, and missteps as they themselves transform over time.
Apabila Vanessa menerima keputusan daripada ujian DNA Salasilah Keluarganya, dia mendapati sebuah keluarga yang dia tidak tahu wujud dan pergi ke rumah mereka sempena Krismas.

name: The Rock & Roll Hall Of Fame 2021 Induction Ceremony

info.plot: The 36th Annual Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony will take place on October 30, 2021 in Cleveland, Ohio. This year's Inductees are Tina Turner, Carole King, The Go-Go's, JAY-Z, Foo Fighters, and Todd Rundgren in the Performer category, along with Kraftwerk, Charley Patton and Gil Scott-Heron for Early Influence, LL Cool J, Billy Preston and Randy Rhoads for Musical Excellence, and Clarence Avant for the Ahmet Ertegun Award. The ceremony will feature a special lineup of guests, including: Angela Bassett inducting Tina Turner, with performances by Christina Aguilera, Mickey Guyton, H.E.R., and Bryan Adams. Taylor Swift inducting Carole King, with performances by Taylor Swift and Jennifer Hudson. Drew Barrymore inducting The Go-Go's, and Paul McCartney inducting Foo Fighters.
Komedian Ricky Velez mengisahkan dengan gamblang sudut pandangnya dalam komedi istimewa HBO ini.

Di masa depan umat manusia yang jauh, Duke Leto Atreides menerima pengawasan planet gurun berbahaya Arrakis, juga dikenali sebagai Dune, satu-satunya sumber bahan paling berharga di alam semesta, "rempah", ubat yang memanjangkan hayat manusia, memberikan tahap pemikiran melampau, dan memungkinkan perjalanan ruang lipatan. Walaupun Leto tahu peluang itu adalah perangkap rumit yang dibuat oleh musuhnya, dia membawa gundik Bene Gesserit, Lady Jessica, anak lelaki dan pewaris Paul, dan penasihat yang paling dipercayai ke Arrakis. Leto mengawal operasi perlombongan rempah, yang menjadi berbahaya dengan kehadiran cacing pasir gergasi. Pengkhianatan yang pahit membawa Paul dan Jessica ke Fremen, penduduk asli Arrakis yang tinggal di padang pasir yang dalam.
Olivia tak dapat melarikan diri daripada kerjaya bebasnya sebagai "Pembisik Pokok Krismas" apabila rancangan percutiannya terganggu oleh tugas saat akhir yang membawanya menemui kekasihnya.

The Many Saints of Newark is the much-anticipated feature film prequel to the groundbreaking, award-winning HBO drama series The Sopranos. Young Anthony Soprano is growing up in the explosive era of the Newark riots in New Jersey, becoming a man just as rival gangsters begin to rise up and challenge the all-powerful DiMeo crime family's hold over the increasingly race-torn city. Caught up in the changing times is the uncle he idolises, Dickie Moltisanti (Nivola), who struggles to manage both his professional and personal responsibilities--and whose influence over his nephew will help make the impressionable teenager into the all-powerful mob boss we'll later come to know: Tony Soprano.
Bekas bintang rodeo dan penternak kuda yang gagal telah mengambil kerja daripada bekas majikannya untuk membawa pulang anak lelaki itu dari Mexico.
Madison dihantui oleh gambaran pembunuhan yang menakutkan, dan seksaannya bertambah teruk selepas dia mengetahui yang gambaran ini sebenarnya realiti.

name: Cha-Ching’S Money Adventures: A Musical Series

info.plot: A musical series featuring six lively members of the Cha-Ching band, to help children learn about the fundamental money management concepts of Earn, Save, Spend and Donate.

Di pantai selatan Long Island pada musim panas tahun 1983, sekumpulan remaja kelas pekerja dan 20-an bekerja di musim panas, jatuh cinta dan putus cinta, serta bergelut dengan apa yang akan berlaku pada masa depan apabila musim panas berakhir dan dunia sebenar memanggil.

name: Sealed With A Kiss: Wedding March 6

info.plot: Rancangan perkahwinan sederhana seorang selebriti dan tunangnya yang realistik semakin meningkat manakala Mick dapat peluang menarik yang Olivia tidak akan membiarkan dia menolak, merisikokan hari besar mereka sendiri

Welcome to hell - aka Belle Reve - the prison with the highest mortality rate in the US of A. Where the worst super villains are kept and where they will do anything to get out - even join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X. Today's do-or-die assignment? Assemble a collection of cons, including Bloodsport, Peacemaker, Captain Boomerang, Ratcatcher 2, Savant, King Shark, Blackguard, Javelin and everyone's favourite psycho, Harley Quinn. Then arm them heavily and drop them (literally) on the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese. Trekking through a jungle teeming with militant adversaries and guerrilla forces at every turn, the Squad is on a search-and-destroy mission with only Colonel Rick Flag on the ground to make them behave … and Amanda Waller’s government techies in their ears, tracking their every movement. And as always, one wrong move and they’re dead (whether at the hands of their opponents, a teammate, or Waller herself). If anyone’s laying down bets, the smart money is against them - all of them.

name: Batman: The Long Halloween, Part Two

info.plot: The Dark Knight must combat a unified front of classic DC Super-Villains, diffuse an escalating mob war and solve the mystery of the Holiday Killer in Batman: The Long Halloween, Part Two, the thrilling conclusion to the two-part entry in the popular series of DC Universe Movies.Inspired by the iconic mid-1990s DC story from Jeph Loeb and Tim Sale, Batman: The Long Halloween, Part Two continues as the Holiday Killer is still at large and, with Bruce Wayne under the spell of the venomous Poison Ivy, Batman is nowhere to be found. Liberated by an unlikely ally, Bruce quickly uncovers the real culprit: Poison Ivy’s employer Carmine Falcone. The Roman, his ranks decimated by Holiday and his business spinning out of control, has been forced to bring on less desirable partners - Gotham City’s rogues’ gallery. In the meantime, Harvey Dent is confronting battles on two fronts: attempting to end the mob war while also dealing with a strained marriage. And, after an attack that leaves Harvey hideously disfigured, the District Attorney unleashes the duality of his psyche that he’s strived his entire life to suppress. Now, as Two-Face, Dent decides to take the law into his own hands and deliver judgement to those who’ve wronged him, his family and all of Gotham. Ultimately, the Dark Knight must put together the tragic pieces that converged to create Two-Face, the Holiday Killer, Batman and Gotham City itself.

Welcome to the Jam! NBA champion and global basketball icon LeBron James goes on an epic adventure alongside timeless Tune Bugs Bunny with this animated/live-action event “Space Jam: A New Legacy” from director Malcolm D. Lee and an innovative filmmaking team including Ryan Coogler and Maverick Carter. This transformational journey is a manic mashup of two worlds that reveals just how far some parents will go to connect with their kids. When LeBron and his young son Dom are trapped in a digital space by a rogue A.I., LeBron must get them home safe by leading Bugs, Lola Bunny and the whole gang of notoriously undisciplined Looney Tunes to victory over the A.I.’s digitised champions on the court - a powered-up roster of professional basketball stars as you’ve never seen them before. It’s Tunes versus Goons in the highest-stakes challenge of his life, that will redefine LeBron’s bond with his son and shine a light on the power of being yourself. The ready-for-action Tunes destroy convention, supercharge their unique talents and surprise even “King” James by playing the game their own way.

Set in 1955 Detroit, No Sudden Move centers on a group of small-time criminals who are hired to steal what they think is a simple document. When their plan goes horribly wrong, their search for who hired them - and for what ultimate purpose - weaves them through all echelons of the race-torn, rapidly changing city.

name: Batman: The Long Halloween Part One

info.plot: It’s a dark time in Gotham City. Held hostage by the powerful Falcone crime family, the city is rife with crime and corruption. Adding to the chaos is the mysterious Holiday killer, who has been targeting the underworld and leaving a trail of terror … and body bags. Batman, Lieutenant Gordon and D.A. Harvey Dent race against the calendar as it advances toward the next ill-fated holiday. Based on the critically acclaimed graphic novel, Batman: The Long Halloween, Part One begins a twisted chain of events that will forever change the Dark Knight.

name: Teen Titans Go! See Space Jam

info.plot: The Teen Titans are visited by the Nerdlucks, the iconic Space Jam villains who tried to capture Michael Jordan and the Looney Tunes. Astonished to discover his fellow Titans have never seen Space Jam, Cyborg organises an exclusive watch party. Of course, if the Titans are watching a movie, don’t expect silence to be golden. Raven and Starfire provide the commentary, Cyborg presents the fun facts, Beast Boy points out the butt shots, and Robin … well, Robin doesn’t trust their new alien friends. Are the Nerdlucks here to attend an innocent watch party, or do they have more sinister motives up their sleeves?

Dari video graffiti jalanan sampai ke potret besar di tembok AS Meksiko, Paper & Glue memakai kekuatan kerja sama seni untuk mengangkat komunitas dan menggugah ekspresi diri. Dikisahkan melalui wawancara artis JR.

name: A Choice Of Weapons: Inspired By Gordon Parks

info.plot: Meraikan legasi jurugambar terkenal Gordon Parks melalui pandangan artis kontemporari yang dipengaruhi oleh karyanya.

After 57 men are arrested for what Lagos police alleged was a “gay initiation party,” the city’s underground nonconformingscene joins forces with Nigerian asylum seekers in New York City to fight for freedom of expression. Codirectedby Nneka Onuorah (The Same Difference) and Giselle Bailey (Burn the House Down), The Legend of theUnderground uncovers rampant discrimination in Nigeria through the eyes of several charismatic youngpeople grappling with the decision to search for a safe haven abroad or stay to fight a system that seeks to silencethem. Vibrant and timely, the film looks at a resilient community as they leverage social media, celebrity, and boldcreativity to spark a cultural revolution against state-endorsed discrimination while celebrating who they are.

Adapted from the Tony Award-winning play of the same name, the film is based on a true story of negotiations between implacable enemies - the secret back-channel talks, unlikely friendships and quiet heroics of a small but committed group of Israelis, Palestinians and one Norwegian couple that led to the 1993 Oslo Peace Accords.

Series stars Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc, Matthew Perry, and David Schwimmer will return to the iconic comedy's original soundstage, Stage 24, on the Warner Bros. Studio lot in Burbank of a celebration of the beloved show.

Seorang ahli bomba wanita dan seorang budak lelaki berusia 12 tahun bertarung untuk nyawa mereka ketika dua pembunuh upahan mengejar mereka melalui hutan belantara di tengah-tengah kebakaran yang marak.

In our modern day, Barry Allen aka The Flash - prior to the formation of the Justice League - discovers that he can run even faster than he had imagined, and that milestone results in his first encounter with the Speed Force. The Flash is promptly launched into an alternate Earth-2 into the midst of a raging battle  primarily between the Nazis and a team of Golden Age DC Super Heroes known as The Justice Society of America. Led by Wonder Woman, the group includes Hourman, Black Canary, Hawkman, Steve Trevor and the Golden Age Flash, Jay Garrick. Earth-1’s Flash quickly volunteers to assist his newfound allies and fellow superheroes to try to tip the scales of the war in their favour while the team tries to figure out how to send him home. But it won't be easy as complications, emotions and hidden identities run deep in this time-skipping World War II animation thriller.

Selepas pembunuhan keluarganya oleh tentera upahan yang kejam, Hanzo Hasashi dibuang ke Netherrealm, dan diberi peluang untuk membalas dendam – dan dibangkitkan sebagai Scorpion, jiwa yang hilang yang ingin membalas dendam.
Pekan-pekan kecil yang kelihatan panoramik dan mesra mengatasi rintangan untuk melakar masa depan yang cerah.

When the Tennysons are attacked by a villainous, dimension-hopping Omni-alien known only as Alien X, they soon meet a parallel universe version of Max who opens the door to hosting multiple Bens and Gwens, forming an alien hero army to combat this threat.

Tess dijemput untuk menjadi sebahagian daripada sebuah rancangan permainan popular, tapi apabila pengacaranya dibunuh secara tiba-tiba, dia dan Detektif Logan cuba untuk merungkai siapakah dalang di sebalik semua ini.

In a future where an adult Gwen Tennyson is president and the world is being taken over by the alien horde known as the Xerge, a disillusioned Ben 10000 is called out of retirement to recruit his 10-year old version from the past, only together can the battle worn adult and the impulsive child save a future under siege.

When Ben meets a young Generator Rex on the run from a hostile Providence, he must work through a series of misunderstandings, and defeat the dark wizard Hex in order to save the world from a malfunctioning Omnitrix infecting the world's human population with alien DNA.

Pada zaman raksasa berjalan di Bumi, perjuangan manusia untuk masa depannya membuatkan Godzilla dan Kong bertembung, lalu menyaksikan dua kuasa alam yang paling berkuasa di planet ini bersua dalam pertempuran yang menakjubkan pada abad-abad itu. Semasa Monarch memulakan misi berbahaya ke kawasan yang belum dipetakan dan menemui petunjuk tentang asal usul Titan, konspirasi manusia mengancam untuk menghapuskan makhluk, baik dan jahat, dari muka bumi selama-lamanya.
A harrowing first-person account of the nightmare that transpired aboard the ill-fated Diamond Princess cruise ship, which set sail from Yokohama, Japan in the earliest days of the COVID-19 pandemic.
Dokumentari tentang penutupan dunia sukan buat kali pertama akibat COVID-19 dan peranan utama atlet dalam hal ketidakadilan kaum yang berlaku ketika pandemik itu.

In ZACK SNYDER’S JUSTICE LEAGUE, determined to ensure Superman’s (Henry Cavill) ultimate sacrifice was not in vain, Bruce Wayne (Ben Affleck) aligns forces with Diana Prince (Gal Gadot) with plans to recruit a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions. The task proves more difficult than Bruce imagined, as each of the recruits must face the demons of their own pasts to transcend that which has held them back, allowing them to come together, finally forming an unprecedented league of heroes. Now united, Batman (Affleck), Wonder Woman (Gadot), Aquaman (Jason Momoa), Cyborg (Ray Fisher) and The Flash (Ezra Miller) may be too late to save the planet from Steppenwolf, DeSaad and Darkseid and their dreadful intentions.

name: Zack Snyder’S Justice League: Justice Is Gray

info.plot: In ZACK SNYDER’S JUSTICE LEAGUE, determined to ensure Superman’s (Henry Cavill) ultimate sacrifice was not in vain, Bruce Wayne (Ben Affleck) aligns forces with Diana Prince (Gal Gadot) with plans to recruit a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions. The task proves more difficult than Bruce imagined, as each of the recruits must face the demons of their own pasts to transcend that which has held them back, allowing them to come together, finally forming an unprecedented league of heroes. Now united, Batman (Affleck), Wonder Woman (Gadot), Aquaman (Jason Momoa), Cyborg (Ray Fisher) and The Flash (Ezra Miller) may be too late to save the planet from Steppenwolf, DeSaad and Darkseid and their dreadful intentions.
Lima pembikin filem baru menunjukkan keluarga barisan hadapan mereka, menunjukkan peristiwa Covid-19 yang memberi kesan dalam kehidupan mereka.

Jerry, seekor tikus kecil, tinggal di sebuah rumah besar di New England di mana dia berkawan dengan pemilik lama, pasangan tua yang penuh kasih sayang. Persahabatan mereka yang lucu dan unik berakhir selepas pasangan warga emas itu meninggal dunia dan rumah mereka dijual. Apabila sebuah keluarga muda berpindah, Jerry bertekad untuk menakutkan mereka daripada mengambil alih rumahnya. Keluarga itu dengan cepat membela kucing terbiar, yang dinamakan Tom, untuk membantu menghilangkan masalah perosak. Dalam perebutan epik untuk rumah itu, Tom & Jerry semakin meningkat menyayangi keluarga itu dan mesti bekerjasama untuk melindungi mereka daripada ancaman luar. Melalui kerja berpasukan, mereka berdua mempelajari nilai utama keluarga dan persahabatan.

name: Scooby-Doo! The Sword And The Scoob

info.plot: Shaggy tarik keluar Excalibur daripada batu yang berdekatan untuk memotong keju, sekarang tiada siapa yang pasti siapa patut menjadi pemerintah! Ahli sihir legenda, Merlin, muncul untuk terangkan bahawa takhta Camelot perlu ditentukan melalui BICARA BERTEMPUR! Para wira kita perlu gunakan semua kebolehan mereka untuk memenangi pertandingan ini, lepaskan Raja Arthur daripada cengkaman ahli sihir jahat, dan pulang ke masa kini dalam kisah legenda Scooby Doo dan Kerabat Raja Arthur!
Selepas menawarkan diri dalam pertandingan penyelesaian silang kata dengan superkomputer baru, editor teka silang kata Tess Harper terlibat dalam penyiasatan pembunuhan pelik CEO teknologi itu.

Chef yang mengimpikan untuk mempunyai trak makanan sendiri, bersetuju untuk menyamar sebagai teman wanita seorang peguam. Bekerjasama, mereka cuba membuktikan dia calon yang ideal untuk mengambil alih firma keluarga itu, tetapi keadaan menjadi rumit apabila mereka mula saling jatuh cinta.
Ditawarkan perjanjian oleh FBI, William O'Neal menyertai Parti Black Panther bahagian Illinois sebagai pemberi maklumat rahsia untuk mengumpulkan maklumat berkaitan Pengerusi Fred Hampton.

name: There Is No I In Threesome

info.plot: With their wedding only a year away, a long-distance couple takes a giant leap of faith and embarks on a risqué adventure of sexual experimentation. In the lead-up to their big day, Ollie and Zoe throw traditional rules to the wind in favor of an open relationship, self-documenting their journey with honesty – from the good, to the bad, and everything in between. But what begins as a fun way to explore themselves and satisfy curious libidos quickly evolves into an intense examination of their relationship and how much it can withstand. Filmed primarily using phone cameras and video chats, There Is No “I” in Threesome is an intimate, surprising look at a modern-day love story – with a shocking ending that you’ll never see coming.

name: Black Art: In The Absence Of Light

info.plot: At the heart of this feature documentary is the groundbreaking “Two Centuries of Black American Art” exhibition curated by the late African American artist and scholar David Driskell in 1976. Held at the Los Angeles County Museum of Art, this pioneering exhibit featured more than 200 works of art by 63 artists and cemented the essential contributions of Black artists in America in the 19th and 20th centuries. The exhibit would eventually travel to the Dallas Museum of Fine Arts, the High Museum of Art in Atlanta, and the Brooklyn Museum. The film shines a light on the exhibition’s extraordinary impact on generations of African American artists who have staked a claim on their rightful place within the 21st-century art world.

Fake Famous explores the meaning of fame and influence in the digital age through an innovative social experiment. Following three Los Angeles-based people with relatively small followings, the film explores the attempts made to turn them into famous influencers by purchasing fake followers and bots to “engage” with their social media accounts.
Timbalan Sheriff Joe Deacon dihantar ke Los Angeles untuk tugas yang sepatutnya cepat. Sebaliknya, dia terlibat dalam mencari pembunuh bersiri yang mengganas di bandar.
Pembikin filem Jay Rosenblatt menjejaki kelas gred limanya untuk melihat apa yang mereka ingat daripada insiden buli yang berlaku 50 tahun lalu.
Second episode of the two-part Euphoria special.
Max Joseph and Monica Lewinsky explore the world of public shaming and cancel culture.
Behind-the-scenes footage and interviews with cast/crew/producers/writers on the larger cultural impact of INSECURE.
Wonder Woman squares off against the Cheetah, a villainess who possesses superhuman strength and agility.

name: Under The Grapefruit Tree: The Cc Sabathia Story

info.plot: Under the Grapefruit Tree: The CC Sabathia Story, a documentary from HBO Sports produced in association with Major League Baseball, follows the deeply personal story of former New York Yankees pitcher Carsten Charles (“CC”) Sabathia, Jr. The film features behind-the-scenes footage from his final season with the Yankees in 2019.In his own words, Sabathia narrates his story. As the highs and lows of his last season are chronicled, Sabathia looks back on his legacy as one of the game’s pre-eminent pitchers, as well as the profound challenges that shaped him, including his longtime battle with addiction that came to a head in 2015 while playing for the Yankees.

Grace Field House ialah rumah anak yatim yang penuh dengan kebahagiaan, di mana anak-anak yatim yang tinggal di sana bersama "Ibu", penjaga mereka, Isabella, semuanya tak sabar membesar untuk dijadikan anak angkat.

Let Them All Talk follows celebrated novelist Alice Hughes (Meryl Streep) and her two oldest friends, Roberta (Candice Bergen) and Susan (Dianne Wiest), on a momentous journey aboard an ocean liner to England, where Alice is due to accept a prestigious literary award. While Alice attempts to restore the bond she once had with her college mates, her nephew Tyler (Lucas Hedges) - in attendance to keep an eye on the bunch - becomes attached to Alice's new agent, Karen (Gemma Chan), who's snuck onto the ship to confer with her client. As the women reminisce and air old grievances with banter and bite, Alice harbors serious doubts about her much-anticipated next manuscript - and keeps the particulars of her personal life close to the chest.

Documentary Alabama Snake highlights the story of Pentecostal minister Glenn Summerford — a man accused of attempting to murder his wife with a rattlesnake in the sleepy town of Scottsboro, Alabama — and the investigation and trial that haunted Southern Appalachia for decades. ‌The film features local historian and folklorist Dr. Thomas Burton, who spent his life studying the culture, beliefs, and folklore of the Pentecostal snake handlers, as he paints a Southern Gothic portrait of Summerford and his tale of demon possession. Directed, co-written and co-produced by Theo Love (The Legend Of Cocaine Island).
In the aftermath of being left by Jules at the train station and relapsing, the first special episode follows Rue (played by Emmy®-winner Zendaya) as she celebrates Christmas.

name: My Gift: A Christmas Special From Carrie Underwood

info.plot: To help spread a little extra joy this holiday season, country music superstar Carrie Underwood takes the stage to perform a combination of beloved traditional favorites and some exciting new tracks from her recently released, and first-ever, Christmas album. My Gift: A Christmas Special from Carrie Underwood finds the singer accompanied by a stunning choir, live orchestra, and some exciting guests – including fellow Grammy®-winner John Legend, her mom Carole, and son Isaiah – for a moving evening filled with music, hope, and holiday cheer.

Documentary Baby God presents a haunting probe into the work of infamous Nevada fertility specialist Dr. Quincy Fortier, a man who deceived countless women struggling to conceive by using his own sperm — without their knowledge or consent — to impregnate them. ‌‌Recalling a time before sperm banks, when little was understood about DNA and inherited genetic traits, the film unravels egregious, once undetectable truths about Fortier's medical practice, as well as his alleged sexual abuse of family members. ‌Following several of his biological children as they grapple with new information about their origins and their own identities, the film examines the morality of one doctor who used science and status to exploit innumerable women — and further his own genetic legacy — over nearly half a century. Directed and produced by Hannah Olson (The Last Cruise).
Hari sambutan kegemaran Scooby-Doo dan Shaggy telah tiba! Penuh dengan raksasa palsu dan gula-gula - Halloween merupakan musim terbaik bagi semua yang lapar.

Documentary film Burning Ojai: Our Fire Story follows a Ventura County family and residents as they navigate devastation, repair and survival after one of the largest wildfires in state history destroys their community.On 4 December 2017, as the Santa Ana winds whipped through Ventura County in California, the Thomas Fire broke out and burned down 282,000 acres of land. Directed by Ojai resident and filmmaker Michael Milano, the film interweaves raw footage of the fires and interviews with those who were profoundly impacted by the devastation in an attempt to underscore the resilience of the local community during a time when wildfires in California show no signs of slowing down.

Based on Jon Meacham’s 2018 bestseller of the same name, The Soul of America follows the writer, journalist, Pulitzer Prize-winning historian and presidential biographer as he offers his timely and invaluable insights into the country’s current political and historical moment by examining its past. Produced by Emmy-award-winning Kunhardt Films (HBO’s True Justice: Bryan Stevenson’s Fight for Equality), the film journeys through Meacham’s life and career while focusing on pivotal historical events such as the women’s suffrage movement, the incarceration of Japanese Americans during World War II, McCarthyism, and the struggle to pass Civil Rights legislation in the 1960s. Part political documentary and part biography, the film recognises forces of hatred and division as recurring themes in American life, but ultimately gives hope that the lessons of the past may bring the nation closer to achieving its democratic ideals. Directed by K.D. Davison.

Documentary film 537 Votes chronicles the political machinations that led to the unprecedented, contested outcome of the 2000 presidential election, including the chaotic voter recount in Florida that ended with Republican George W. Bush winning by a razor-thin margin against Democrat Al Gore.From director Billy Corben and his producing partner Alfred Spellman, with Adam McKay (HBO’s “Succession”) and Todd Schulman executive producing, the film details how the international custody battle over six-year old Elian Gonzalez triggered a political earthquake in Miami-Dade County in 2000, swaying the outcome of the presidential election. With the margin of victory hinged on Florida, George W. Bush won the presidency by a mere 537 votes. With new insights, the documentary exposes the key players who contributed to the chaos in the contested Florida county, including interviews from insiders and political operatives at the time such as Roger Stone, Joe Geller, Chairman of the Miami-Dade County Democratic Party, and Al Cárdenas, Chairman of the Florida Republican Party.537 Votes is directed by Billy Corben, executive produced by Adam McKay and Todd Schulman, and produced by Billy Corben and Alfred Spellman.

Based on a best-selling book by New York Times national security correspondent David E. Sanger, The Perfect Weapon explores the rise of cyber conflict as the primary way nations now compete with and sabotage one another. ‌‌Directed by Emmy-winning filmmaker John Maggio (Panic: The Untold Story of the 2008 Financial Crisis) and featuring interviews with top military, intelligence, and political officials on the frontlines of cyber terrorism, the documentary brings to light the combatants and innocent victims caught in the crosshairs of a hidden war that has been going on for decades — a war that America started, but has no idea how to finish.‌‌Travelling from the deserts of Iran and Las Vegas to the back alleys of Beijing and Moscow, the film chronicles America's pursuit of enemies who have plotted against its institutions, its economy, and its democracy. A never-before-seen look inside the secret world of spies, hackers, and scammers in the lead-up to the 2020 U.S. elections, for which fear of cyber attacks has mounted to an all-time high, The Perfect Weapon is a timely reflection on the ultimate price — and potential "victors" — of this high-stakes conflict.

When a blast from Ben's past - Vilgax - returns to do double the damage on Team Tennyson and planet Earth itself, Ben must go interstellar to save the day while Gwen and Grandpa Max team-up with Kevin to protect the world in Ben's absence, but when our boy hero is confused for the villain in space, Ben is forced to defend himself in the trial of a century!

name: Wild Card: The Downfall Of A Radio Loudmouth

info.plot: Wild Card: The Downfall of a Radio Loudmouth charts the rise and fall of prominent New York sports radio personality Craig Carton. Through a series of candid interviews with Carton, the film reveals how the radio host’s secret insatiable gambling addiction, financed by an illicit ticket-broking business, brought his career to a sudden halt when he was arrested by FBI agents and charged with conspiracy, wire fraud, and securities fraud in 2017. Carton was convicted and began serving a 42-month sentence in federal prison in June 2019.Directed and produced by Martin Dunn and Marie McGovern of StreetSmartVideo, the documentary includes revealing interviews with many of those who were closest to him, including his former co-host Boomer Esiason, former New Jersey Governor Chris Christie, and the Boomer & Carton crew of Al Dukes, Jerry Recco and Eddie Scozzare, among others.

When Luis A. Miranda Jr. left Puerto Rico for New York City in the 1970s, he had big dreams, but little did he know how far he’d go. ‌‌Siempre, Luis follows Miranda over the course of a year as his devotion to family and country propels his insatiable appetite for empowering his fellow Latinos. With humor and heart, the documentary dives into Miranda's campaign to mitigate the devastation of Hurricane Maria in his homeland by tirelessly organizing relief efforts and managing the logistics behind bringing his son Lin-Manuel Miranda’s award-winning production of Hamilton to the island. ‌‌Welcoming audiences into the man's passionate, patriotic, family-focused world, Siempre, Luis ultimately tells the story of a proud American whose lifetime dedication to community and fatherhood has rendered him an unstoppable force of nature.

name: Pat The Dog: A Very Special Dog

info.plot: Lola dreams of having a dog despite her parents’ disapproval.  Without them knowing she decides to adopt a little dog that she tries to train.  But the Guanos have no intention of letting her get away with it and they try to get rid of the dog.  Then there is Norbert who would love to see him locked up in his pound.  In self-defense, the little puppy quickly learns that he can make objects and stand on his hind legs, thus taking his first steps as...Pat the (super)dog!

Cerita terbaru siri "Habla" yang memenangi anugerah daripada HBO Latino ialah dokumentari yang memaparkan temu bual dengan wira setiap hari, selebriti yang memberi inspirasi dan orang Latin yang berpengaruh dari semua lapisan masyarakat.

Coastal Elites is a socially distanced comedic satire that spotlights five characters breaking down and breaking through as they grapple with politics, culture, and the pandemic. Starring Bette Midler (Hello, Dolly!), Kaitlyn Dever (Unbelievable, Booksmart), Dan Levy (Schitt’s Creek), Sarah Paulson (American Crime Story), and Issa Rae (HBO’s Insecure), this special presentation explores our current world of deeply divided politics and the universal pursuit of human connection. When the shutdown forces these distinct and impassioned people with varying points-of-view across the United States to cope in isolation, they react with frustration, hilarity, and introspection.Originally conceived for the Public Theater in New York, Coastal Elites took the leap from the stage to the screen at the beginning of the pandemic and evolved in real-time as the unprecedented events of 2020 unfolded, with filming taking place this summer under quarantine guidelines. Coastal Elites is written by playwright and screenwriter Paul Rudnick; and directed by Jay Roach.

Seventeen-year-old Veronica (Haley Lu Richardson) finds herself pregnant. With a promising college-bound future now disappearing before her eyes, Veronica makes a difficult decision to take a 1000 mile hilarious road trip to New Mexico over three days with her ex-best friend, Bailey (Barbie Ferreira). During the journey, they discover sometimes the most important choice you will make in life is who your friends are.

Providing a revealing behind-the-curtain of Washington politics, HBO’s The Swamp is a documentary that follows three renegade Republican congressmen in their attempt to champion President Trump’s call to “drain the swamp” while exploring what it would really take to reform Congress. Directed by Daniel DiMauro and Morgan Pehme (Get Me Roger Stone), The Swamp provides a look behind the curtain of Washington politics by following three Republican congressmen - Matt Gaetz (R-FL), Thomas Massie (R-KY), and Ken Buck (R-CO) - over the course of a pivotal year in politics as they push President Trump’s call to “drain the swamp." With unique behind-the-scenes access to the inner workings of the House amid major breaking news events, including the Robert Mueller hearing and Presidential impeachment proceedings, the film presents a revealing look at the core democratic institution of American government and demonstrates the breadth and grip of a system that rewards fundraising above all else, plaguing Congress on both sides of the aisle.

Meet Clark Kent. Sent to Earth as an infant from the dying planet Krypton, he arrived with as many questions as the number of light-years he traveled. Now a young man, he makes his living in Metropolis as an intern at the Daily Planet – alongside reporter Lois Lane – while secretly wielding his alien powers of flight, super-strength and x-ray vision in the battle for good. Follow the fledgling hero as he engages in bloody battles with intergalactic bounty hunter Lobo and before fighting for his life with the alien Parasite. The world will learn about Superman…but first, Superman must save the world!

Follow Stockton, California's 28-year-old Mayor Michael Tubbs in this documentary that chronicles his day-to-day life as he works to implement the city's basic income program and deals with a disturbing string of murders. At age 26, on the same day Donald Trump was elected president in 2016, Michael Tubbs became the first African American mayor of his beleaguered hometown of Stockton, California, as well as the youngest mayor of a major American city. Stockton On My Mind, from filmmaker Marc Levin (HBO's One Nation Under Stress, Class Divide), follows Tubbs’ personal and political journey, exploring how growing up amid poverty and violence shaped his vision for innovative change. Born to a teenage mother and a father in prison, Tubbs felt society destined him for either prison or death. Defying expectations, he received a scholarship to Stanford University and returned home to Stockton to “Upset the Set-Up,” serving first on the city council and then running for mayor. Now, Tubbs is launching some of the boldest social and economic policy experiments in the country in an effort to lift up his city of 300,000 residents, and turning it into a kind of social policy incubator. Stockton On My Mind weaves the Mayor's story together with an extraordinary group of people living in Stockton, some of whose stories echo Tubbs’ own experience, and many of whom are working alongside him to reinvent the city. Yet, change is hard, and there are many headwinds to contend with.

SHOWBIZ KIDS offers an unvarnished look at the high risk, high reward business of working as a child actor in the entertainment industry. The film chronicles the personal and professional price of fame and failure on a child. Those who know the industry best, including several successful child actors and two aspiring hopefuls, unpack their own complicated experiences as they reconcile the hardships they've faced and sacrifices they've made on their way to finding success in show business.

When the bears' love of food trucks and viral videos gets out of hand, it catches the attention of the menacing Agent Trout from the National Wildlife Control, who pledges to restore the "natural order" by separating them forever. Chased from their home, Grizz decides there’s only one thing they can do to find refuge - move to Canada! The Bears embark on an epic road trip filled with new friends, dangerous obstacles, and massive parties. But most importantly, the perilous journey will force the Bears to face how they first met and became brothers, in order to keep their family bond from splitting apart.

name: Yvonne Orji: Momma, I Made It!

info.plot: Comedian and actress Yvonne Orji, star of the series Insecure, presents her funniest side in her first HBO comedy special. Orji gets a packed Howard Theatre rolling with laughter as she brings her razor-sharp wit and confidence to the stage. Both celebrating and poking fun at her strict, formative Nigerian-American upbringing, Yvonne speaks to her unique journey from pre-med to comedy.

name: Bully. Coward. Victim.  The Story Of Roy Cohn

info.plot: Bully. Coward. Victim. The Story of Roy Cohn offers an unflinching look at the infamous attorney who prosecuted Ivy Meeropol’s grandparents, Julius and Ethel Rosenberg, and later argued persuasively for their execution in what became known as the “atomic spies” case. Directed by Ivy Meeropol, the film examines Cohn’s life as chief counsel to Senator Joseph McCarthy in the late 1950s and then through the 1980s when he became a darling of the Reagan White House, a rabid anti-homosexuality activist and political mentor to Donald Trump before dying from AIDS in 1986. The documentary draws from extensive, newly unearthed archival material, recorded at the height of Cohn’s career as a power broker in the rough and tumble world of New York City business and politics.

A look at the career and personal life of actress Natalie Wood through the eyes of her daughter, Natasha Gregson Wagner. The documentary presents unpublished material, as well as interviews with friends, family and colleagues, examining the personal and professional triumphs and challenges of her life, often overshadowed by her tragic death at age 43.

name: Lego Dc Shazam: Magic And Monsters!

info.plot: Ada adiwira baharu di bandar, dan namanya Shazam! Adiwira yang baik hati ini ingin menyertai Liga Keadilan, tapi untuk itu, dia perlu dedahkan identitinya sebagai Billy Batson yang berumur 10 tahun! Alamak! Billy belajar bahawa sebuah pasukan perlu saling mempercayai sambal dia melawan kejahatan Mr. Mind dan Black Adam dalam Lego Justice League Shazam! Monster Society of Evil!

In 2017, an investigation into a basketball corruption scandal led to the arrest of executives at Adidas and assistant coaches at major college programs. At the center of it all was Christian Dawkins, an unknown 25-year-old who was allegedly part of a criminal enterprise. In this HBO documentary, Dawkins explains how he ended wound up in a hotel suite surrounded by FBI agents.

name: Kill Chain: The Cyber War On America'S Elections

info.plot: The legendary Finnish hacker-turned-election expert Harri Hursti takes a chilling look at how vulnerable the technology used in the US voting systems really is. This HBO Documentary features interviews with key figures in the election security community as well as US senators fighting to protect the sanctity of the votes of US citizens.

Stunned by reports from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention that life expectancy in the United States is declining for the first time in more than a century, Dr. Sanjay Gupta sets out to see what’s happening and why. While looking at society through the state of its health, he discovers an epidemic of self-inflicted deaths of despair (caused by drug overdoses, chronic liver disease and suicide) that are driven by an increasingly stressed America.

Workers at the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant in Japan risk their lives to stay at the power plant to handle the meltdown and prevent total destruction after the region is devastated by an earthquake and tsunami in 2011. Based on the non-fiction book titled “On The Brink: The Inside Story of Fukushima Daiichi” by Ryusho Kadota, painstakingly gathered from research and interviews with over 90 people, this epic tale of the nuclear power plant accident pieces together the tense situation known only to the people who were on the scene, the mounting damage, and the conflict between headquarters and the Prime Minister’s office. Starring Japanese film stalwarts Ken Watanabe and Koichi Sato, the story chronicles the five-day battle bravely waged by the “Fukushima 50”. Large-scale sets were built to faithfully reproduce the emergency response headquarters and destroyed residences. In addition, some scenes were shot at Yokota Air Base. This is the first Japanese film to depict the disaster.

name: After Truth: Disinformation And The Cost Of Fake News

info.plot: Focusing on several high-profile made-up news in recent years with real world consequences, After Truth: Disinformation and the Cost of Fake News brings to light the current phenomenon of “fake news” in the U.S. and how disinformation, conspiracy theories, and false news stories impact on the average citizen.

Directed and produced by Academy Award winner Alex Gibney (Citizen K, Enron: The Smartest Guys In The Room), this documentary film follows Dr. Dorothy Otnow Lewis, a psychiatrist who has dedicated her career to studying murderers and seeking answers as to why people kill. The film explores her lifelong attempts to look beyond the grisly details of homicides and into the hearts and minds of the killers themselves. Crazy, Not Insane highlights Dr. Lewis’ research, videotaped death row interviews, and the formative experiences and neurological dysfunction of infamous murderers such as Arthur Shawcross and Ted Bundy, to challenge the notion that murderers are made and not born. Narrated by actress Laura Dern, Crazy, Not Insane also explores the death penalty itself, questioning whether or not it is actually a deterrent to violence and asking an important question: Once dangerous killers are locked away and the public is protected, why is society so determined to execute these human beings?

Women of Troy is an HBO documentary exploring the career of the Cheryl Miller-led USC Trojans and their impact on women’s basketball. The film features a series of interviews with all-time USC greats and also highlights the Trojans’ showdown with Louisiana Tech at the 1983 national championship and how this pivotal moment in sports history impacted future generations.

name: Ali & Cavett: The Tale Of The Tapes

info.plot: The courage and charisma of boxing legend Muhammad Ali are witnessed through the unlikely bond he formed with TV host Dick Cavett. Interweaving archival footage of Ali's many appearances with insights from authors, sports commentators and others, the film paints an illuminating portrait of a man whose impact on the civil rights movement rivals his feats in the boxing ring.

When Krypton’s last son crash-lands in Cold War-era Russia instead of rural Kansas, an alternate reality unfolds in this DC Elseworlds adventure. Here, we find Superman spearheading a Communist campaign to advance the ideologies of the Soviet state. Meanwhile across the Atlantic, the brilliant American scientist Lex Luthor devises a plan to rein in and ultimately destroy the alien Soviet threat. What follows is a gripping game of cat and mouse that will leave all of humanity hanging in the balance.

name: We Are The Dream: The Kids Of The Oakland And Mlk Oratorical Fest

info.plot: Students take the stage in a public speaking competition in this inspiring portrait of Oakland, California's 40th Annual MLK Oratorical Festival.
